Linq例子

LINQ，语言集成查询（Language Integrated Query）是一组用于c#和Visual Basic语言的扩展。它允许编写C#或者Visual Basic代码以查询数据库相同的方式操作内存数据。

一，linq对应sql的代码

1.查询stu_a表全部数据	
linq 
	from a in stu_a
	select a
sql 
	select ×
	from stu_a
2.查询stu_a表id=1的数据
linq 
	from a in stu_a
	where a.id==1
	select a
sql 
	select ×
	from stu_a
	where id=1
3.查询表赋值别名列e
linq 
	from a in stu_a
	select new
	{
		序号=a.id,
		姓名=a.name
	}
sql 
	select id as '序号',name as '姓名'
	from stu_a
3查询多表数据
linq 
	from a in stu_a
	join b in stu_b
	on a.ID equals b.ID
	select new
	{
		序号=a.id,
		姓名=b.name
	}
sql 
	select stu_a.id as '序号',stu_b.name as '姓名'
	from stu_a,stu_b
